languages.text: "Останови своих людей, элантах! Здесь что-то не так. Дети Азуриана полны отчаяния, но сотворить подобное с судном мон-кай... Нет, мы не животные. Я взываю к твоему благоразумию и данному обещанию — не губи моих собратьев за деяния, которых они не совершали".

"Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."
languages.original_text: "Останови своих людей, элантах! Здесь что-то не так. Дети Азуриана полны отчаяния, но сотворить подобное с судном мон-кай... Нет, мы не животные. Я взываю к твоему благоразумию и данному обещанию — не губи моих собратьев за деяния, которых они не совершали".

traits.locale_text: "Call off your men, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kinsmen for the deeds they did not commit."

"Call off your men, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kinsmen for the deeds they did not commit."

"Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

"Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

"Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

languages.text: “快让你的族人住手，外界人！事情有点不太对劲。虽然阿苏焉的子嗣身处绝望之中，但他们真的会对猴子的舰船犯下这样的恶行吗？……不，我们不是禽兽。我恳求你谨慎行事，遵守你的诺言，不要因为我的亲人没有犯下过的罪行而判处他们死刑。”
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

traits.locale_text: “快让你的族人住手，外界人！事情有点不太对劲。虽然阿苏焉的子嗣伸出绝望之中，但他们真的会对猴子的舰船犯下这样的恶行吗？……不，我们不是禽兽。我恳求你谨慎行事，遵守你的诺言，不要因为我的亲人没有犯下过的罪行而判处他们死刑。”

languages.text: « Rappelez vos troupes, elantach ! Quelque chose ne va pas. Les enfants d'Asuryan sont en plein désarroi, mais pas au point de s'en prendre à un vaisseau mon-keigh de la sorte... Non, nous ne sommes pas des animaux. J'en appelle à votre sagesse et à la promesse que vous m'avez faite ; ne tuez pas les miens pour des actes qu'ils n'ont pas commis. »
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

traits.locale_text: « Rappelez vos troupes, elantach ! Quelque chose ne va pas. Les enfants d'Asuryan sont en plein désarroi, mais pas au point de s'en prendre à un vaisseau mon-keigh de la sorte... Non, nous ne sommes pas des animaux. J'en appelle à votre sagesse et à la promesse que vous m'avez faite ; ne tuez pas les miens pour des actes qu'ils n'ont pas commis. »

languages.text: "Ruft Eure Leute zurück, Elantach! Irgendetwas stimmt nicht. Die Kinder von Asuryan sind entsetzt, aber ein Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff so zuzurichten ... Nein, wir sind keine Tiere. Ich appelliere an Eure Besonnenheit und an Euer Versprechen, mein Volk für keine Taten zu vernichten, die es nicht begangen hat."
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

traits.locale_text: "Ruft Eure Leute zurück, Elantach! Irgendetwas stimmt nicht. Die Kinder von Asuryan sind entsetzt, aber ein Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff so zuzurichten ... Nein, wir sind keine Tiere. Ich appelliere an Eure Besonnenheit und an Euer Versprechen, mein Volk für keine Taten zu vernichten, die es nicht begangen hat."

languages.text: «¡Dígale a su gente que se retire, elantach! Algo va mal: los hijos de Asuryan están abatidos, pero hacerle algo así a una nave mon-keigh... No deberíamos actuar como animales. Le pido que tenga prudencia y cumpla la promesa que hizo, no destroce a mi gente por actos que no cometieron».
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

traits.locale_text: «¡Dígale a su gente que se retire, elantach! Algo va mal: los hijos de Asuryan están abatidos, pero hacerle algo así a una nave mon-keigh... No deberíamos actuar como animales. Le pido que tenga prudencia y cumpla la promesa que hizo, no destroce a mi gente por actos que no cometieron».

languages.text: 「仲間を呼び戻せ、エランタ！何かおかしい。狼狽していたとはいえ、アシュリアンの御子らがモン＝ケイの船にこんなことをするとは…。いや、我々は動物ではない。あなたの思慮深さと、あなたがした約束に訴えたい。犯してもいない罪で、我が血族を滅ぼさないでくれ」
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間を呼び戻せ、エランタ！何かおかしい。狼狽していたとはいえ、アシュリアンの御子らがモン＝ケイの船にこんなことをするとは…。いや、我々は動物ではない。あなたの思慮深さと、あなたがした約束に訴えたい。犯してもいない罪で、我が血族を滅ぼさないでくれ」

languages.text: "Elantach, durdurun adamlarınızı! Bir terslik var. Asuryan'ın Çocukları bedbaht olabilir ama bir mon-keigh gemisine böyle bir şey yapmak... Yok, hayvan değiliz biz. Sizi ihtiyata ve verdiğiniz sözü tutmaya davet ediyorum. İşlemedikleri bir suç için soydaşlarımı katletmeyin."
languages.original_text: "Call off your people, elantach! Something is wrong. The Children of Asuryan are dismayed, but doing something like this to a mon-keigh vessel... No, we are not animals. I appeal to your prudence and the promise you made, do not destroy my kin for the deeds they did not commit."
